Package org.apache.juneau.oapi

Class OpenApiSerializer

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.Context
org.apache.juneau.BeanContextable
org.apache.juneau.BeanTraverseContext
org.apache.juneau.serializer.Serializer
org.apache.juneau.serializer.WriterSerializer
org.apache.juneau.uon.UonSerializer
org.apache.juneau.oapi.OpenApiSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnnotationProvider, HttpPartSerializer, OpenApiMetaProvider, UonMetaProvider
public class OpenApiSerializer extends UonSerializer implements OpenApiMetaProvider
Serializes POJOs to values suitable for transmission as HTTP headers, query/form-data parameters, and path variables.
Notes:
  • This class is thread safe and reusable.
See Also:
